mapper.select: select fid, pfid, name, icon, path, display_order from eoffice_folder where deleted = 0 and fid in (select rid from eoffice_perm where type = 10 and target_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := pfid FROM eoffice_folder WHERE fid = _id) AS pfid, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{fid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, @l := 0) vars, eoffice_folder AS h WHERE @r <> 0 ) t1 JOIN eoffice_folder t2 ON t1._id = t2.fid
